title: MR Watch House
description: A responsive ecommerce site for selling watches with user authentication and dashboard for both customer and seller.
features: Customers can order products , cancel orders and add reviews.
Admin/Seller can manage order and product. Also can add admin.

title: True Tour Mentor
description: A responsive travel agency site where user can make travel palns, book plans etc.
features: A responsive travel agency website with user authentication.
Users can make travel plans, choose plans, confirm plans, cancel plans etc

title: Color Detection Service
description: A color identifier create with machine learning and provide service with Django.
features: Extract presents color in a images.

title: Content Scrapper
description: A web scraper for scrape data from various web site.
features: Scrape titles/headlines with their URL of a webpage.
Scrape article and information about that article from provided webpage URL.
Scrape google search result corresponding to a query.
